name: Super Solvers Gizmos & Gadgets!
summary: 1993 saw the release of Super Solvers: Gizmos & Gadgets! (also known as Gizmos & Gadgets! A Super Solvers Science Adventure) on the DOS system. A action, educational game, created by The Learning Co. and distributed by The Learning Co.. If you like math / logic, puzzle-solving, science, download, install and enjoy Super Solvers: Gizmos & Gadgets!!
